projects.name: GLOB-FRONTEND
projects.description: Ionic / React frontend (Vite + TypeScript). Mobile/web UI for the GLOB platform.

projects.name: devmultiverse-api-catalog
projects.description: API/catalog service (Python + Docker).

projects.name: Proyecto-de-moviles
projects.description: Backend API for mobile project — Node + TypeScript, uses Sequelize and Postgres (containerized).

projects.name: devmultiverse-api-central
projects.description: Main API (TypeScript). Uses tsoa and MS SQL client libraries — central backend for the devmultiverse suite.

projects.name: EduPlanPro-backend
projects.description: Backend server for EduPlanPro (Express/Node). Postgres (pg) is used as the DB.

projects.name: POS
projects.description: Point-of-sale backend (TypeScript). Uses mssql (SQL Server) as database client.

projects.name: API-exam
projects.description: API (C#/.NET) for exam system. README documents SQL Server setup for the project.

projects.name: GLOB-DB
projects.description: Central configuration and database repository for GLOB platform. Contains PostgreSQL database schemas, Docker Compose orchestration for all microservices, environment configurations, and multilingual documentation (EN, ES, FR, PT). Manages the setup for the entire GLOB ecosystem including database, pgAdmin, API services, frontend, SSE notifications, and AI performance modules.

projects.name: GLOB-DATA-APPLICATION
projects.description: Main data source API for GLOB. RESTful API built with FastAPI for data extraction, validation, transformation, and delivery from the database to different system modules.

projects.name: GLOB-IMPORT-EXPORT-MODULE
projects.description: Robust and scalable microservice for efficient project and issue management. Provides import/export functionality for Jira project data. Built with .NET 8 and fully containerized with Docker.

projects.name: EduPlanPro-Frontend
projects.description: React front-end for EduPlanPro (React, Jotai, axios).

projects.name: ARShopping
projects.description: Android app (Kotlin) for price comparison with web scraping.

projects.name: post-front-end
projects.description: Front-end template and client for POS (React / TypeScript).

projects.name: Sistemas-Distribuidos-Linux-PVM
projects.description: Course / research material repository (various Linux distributed systems content).

projects.name: proyecto-progra
projects.description: Programming-2 course project (Java + HTML).

projects.name: GLOB-SSE
projects.description: Server-Sent Events service for DB notifications (Node/Express + pg).

projects.name: GLOB-PERFORMANCE-IA
projects.description: Microservice for LookUp Project (Globales' course project) focused on giving an AI review about project's status.

projects.name: GLOB-SECURITY
projects.description: Microservice for Quick Report (Globales' course project) focused on User Authentication and password recovery with email integration.

projects.name: Exam
projects.description: Kotlin-based mobile project.
